content: While down to last year, our digital business has seen significant growth over the past 3 years, with revenue up 60% to second quarter 2019. This reflected higher in stocks as we lapped supply chain disruption last year, earlier receipts of back-to-school and fall goods, reflecting improved lead times and higher units to support new Aerie and offline store openings. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question.
